descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see... 2 horizontal squares and 2 vertical blue squares.
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size... have the same size.
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to... continue the pattern of red squares horizontal and continue the blue squares vertical to reach the edge of the grid. On the square that blue and red squares crosses, color that one yellow.
